faq.q: Is it safe for indoor play?
faq.a: Yes. The balls are soft-bounce and the paddles are lightweight with smooth edges.
You only need a phone to scan the QR once. After that, you can play screen-free.
Designed for ages 3-8, with missions that scale for older siblings too.
